website_summaries.verdict: High-potency roach insecticide in gel formulation for use in commercial, industrial, and residential locations.
pros: Highly effective specifically for cockroach control
Formulated with Abamectin B1 0.05% in a highly palatable nutrient matrix, to attract and transmit poison to roaches
Versatile, can be used in all kinds of locations, including residences, supermarkets, and food-handling areas
cons: Requires multiple treatments over time to eliminate larger infestations

customer_reviews.title: Better than the pros
customer_reviews.text: I used water bottle caps as bait trays. I put a dozen tiny droplets in each cap in order to easily see if it is being consumed. I placed the caps in corners under the stove, fridge hall closet and other areas of the house. Each morning for the first four days the bait was completely consumed. On the fifth day most of the bait trays had only been partially consumed and by the sixth there was no longer any signs of roach activity. It has now been three weeks and we haven't seen a single roach. I am now only putting out two caps and refreshing the bait once a week.
customer_reviews.author: Richard L

customer_reviews.title: The best product for German roaches!
customer_reviews.text: If you have a problem with German roaches in your house buy this! Don't waste your money on anything else from Home Depot or Lowes or anywhere else. This stuff will get rid of them. It is extremely effective!
customer_reviews.author: csillagok0281

customer_reviews.title: not seeing the effect
customer_reviews.text: I did not experience some of the great results that others have. I used a different top selling brand on Amazon and the roaches ate it every night. I am not seeing the same effect with Vandetta. I give it a mid-range rating because I am assuming that it would kill cockroaches if they ate it.
customer_reviews.author: Harold M. Ballard

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Works incredibly. Thought it was a long shot. I did not even know there was that many german roaches. I placed it under the sink and also by the storage area and i woke up to a few dead the first day. I used this once and I have not seen any but the clean up was bad. The roaches were under the sink in a lump sum. I have yet to see a live one
customer_reviews.author: R. R. G

customer_reviews.title: YOU NEED TO DO MORE THAN JUST THIS

customer_reviews.title: This works 99% better than any of the big name companies that overcharge you and get no results!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is the real deal. I used to pay a (smaller) company $75 every month to come and and lay this very same product down. I looked it up online and found I could buy it myself and dumped the company and saved mucho money. I kinda felt bad I saw the name as he was using it, or I would still be paying him way too much money. Kidding. Well worth the price and this box lasts for many months.
customer_reviews.author: schuey1010
